Definition: In this assignment, you will be given a story title with four sentences. Your task is to add a fifth sentence, which relates to the story.

Positive Examples.input: Title: Tom's Cold. Sentence 1: Tom was playing outside in the rain. Sentence 2: The next day, Tom felt sick. Sentence 3: Tom's mother thought that he could possibly have a cold. Sentence 4: Tom went to the doctor.
Positive Examples.output: Tom had a very bad cold.
Positive Examples.explanation: Tom was playing in rain so he got bad cold.

Positive Examples.input: Title: Billy's shoes. Sentence 1: Billy was playing outside. Sentence 2: He tripped over a rock. Sentence 3: Both of his shoes came off. Sentence 4: He picked up both shoes.
Positive Examples.output: He put his shoes back on his feet.
Positive Examples.explanation: Billy shoes came off as he tripped over a rock.

Negative Examples.input: Title: Beth burns the beans. Sentence 1: Beth is cooking. Sentence 2: She is making beans. Sentence 3: She gets a phone call. Sentence 4: She talks for hours.

Sentence 3: No one had ever heard of the characters she dressed up as though. Sentence 4: One year she dressed as a fake anime character she made up.
